response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but we believe it would be an even greater asset in your possession. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $950,000, aiming to ensure both a fair transaction and a valuable acquisition for you. We trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to the possibility of bringing this product into your esteemed collection.", "product_price": 950000}
